Press Releases.Title: 1,111 New Cases of Covid-19 Infection
Press Releases.MainContent:
As of 21 April 2020, 12pm, the Ministry of Health (MOH) has preliminarily confirmed an additional 1,111 cases of COVID-19 infection in Singapore, the vast majority of whom are Work Permit holders residing in foreign worker dormitories. 20 cases are Singaporeans/ Permanent Residents.

2.       We are still working through the details of the cases, and further updates will be shared via the MOH press release that will be issued tonight.

MINISTRY OF HEALTH
21 APRIL 2020
